findings.title: Optimization of oToken Balance Polling
findings.description: The finding suggests reusing the `oTokenSellAmount` variable instead of polling the balance of `otokens` again.

findings.title: Inaccurate Calculation of queuedWithdrawAmount
findings.description: Using newPricePerShare to calculate queuedWithdrawAmount is not exactly correct due to shares being queued at various prices.

findings.title: Simplified `mintAmount` Calculation
findings.description: The calculation of `mintAmount` can be simplified to `(depositAmount*10**Vault.OTOKEN_DECIMALS*10**Vault.OTOKEN_DECIMALS) / (oToken.strikePrice()*10**collateralDecimals)`

findings.title: Revert on Collateral with Decimals < 8
findings.description: The `collateralDemicals.sub(8)` expression will revert on collateral with decimals less than 8.

findings.title: Potential Scaling Issue with mintAmount
findings.description: The `mintAmount` value calculation for collaterals with less than 8 decimals may cause precision loss if scaled down instead of up.

findings.title: Inaccurate Comment
findings.description: The 'deposited asset' comment should state 'option address'

findings.title: Inaccurate queuedWithdrawAmount Calculation
findings.description: Using `newPricePerShare` to calculate `queuedWithdrawAmount` is not exactly correct because shares were queued at various prices.

findings.title: Outdated Double Approve Comment
findings.description: The double approve comment is outdated and helper is handling it now.

findings.title: Major: Specifying only the `minETHOut` is not enough
findings.description: The calculation of queuedWithdrawAmount by adding it to the locked balance for fee calculation may not always be correct.

findings.title: Insignificant optimizations
findings.description: Optimizations can be made to improve code efficiency.

findings.title: Temporary Inability to Complete Scheduled Withdrawal
findings.description: Minor problem which could lead to a temporary inability to complete scheduled withdrawal until the end of the current round.
